title: Wednesday Post Show (02-02-22)
itunes:title: Wednesday Post Show (02-02-22)
description:
Bobby starts by taking calls from listeners about Lunchbox. One has thoughts on Lunchbox reaction to Abby’s national anthem and another caller who wants to get Lunchbox’s Valentine’s Day reservation in Las Vegas. We get an update on Amy’s Venmo hack and Scuba Steve’s Christmas gift to Bobby that still hasn’t arrived. He says it’s worth “thousands” but got it for free.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
